title: Rammus
body:
So i am a casual rammus player from time to time only for the reason that NO HARDLY EVER PLAYS HIM why cant we see a real champion update on this poor guy he has hardly any means on being played and he's a champion from beta i mean cmon riot show some love to some additional old'e champs would ya u showed some to poppy

P.S. im also upset with how riot has left rammus in the dirt cause i am owner of king rammus skin and i would like to see some updates to rammus just so i can have a real reason to play that skin some more and not feel like im wasting my time playing him in a 40min game

replies.body: Rammus is one of those champions that isn't horrible, he is just in a weak place because the current meta doesn't suit him. I'm not even sure what they would give him to make him better personally, but I don't think he needs outright meta, just a meta shift in his favor.

> Rammus is one of those champions that isn't horrible, he is just in a weak place because the current meta doesn't suit him. I'm not even sure what they would give him to make him better personally, but I don't think he needs outright meta, just a meta shift in his favor.

thats the thing tho Jamaree about how they made this champ with hardly any wiggle room for changes and improvement to his abilities since 2009 when he was first made however possibly increasing some of his stat builds off of say ap for his ult might help a little increased dmg to ap amount or increased defense to his armor and magic resis with his defense curl might even help some what but king rammus is a boss skin to show off to folks and i do enjoy playing him time to time and again

> [{quoted}](name=SENSEI Turtel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aXMvN30T,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-16T13:51:45.166+0000)

> thats the thing tho Jamaree about how they made this champ with hardly any wiggle room for changes and improvement to his abilities since 2009 when he was first made however possibly increasing some of his stat builds off of say ap for his ult might help a little increased dmg to ap amount or increased defense to his armor and magic resis with his defense curl might even help some what but king rammus is a boss skin to show off to folks and i do enjoy playing him time to time and again

Wouldn't really help though, like he is playable, it isn't like he is in a unplayable spot, just doesn't click right now. Maybe tools to better farm in jungle so he can't be counter jungled? Idk.

I know what they need to give him. Revert the Rammus "rework". That would suit me just fine. Or take his SELF slow from his W away and give him his damage back on his R. He is fairly unsatisfying now.
he's a very strong pick, no on plays him for some reason
For some reason? Try having a SELF slow on your W. Try having a R with laughable damage unless fed. Try maybe because he is extremely unsatisfying. That's about right.
